caption.center: TONY WHITE, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.850 Appeal from the Circuit Court for St. Johns County, Wendy W. Berger, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Tony White, Crestview, pro se.
Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Wesley Heidt, Assistant Attorney General, Daytona Beach, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
SAWAYA, TORPY and LAWSON, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.Page 1
